:py:mod:`~farabi.models.segmentation.unet.unet_trainer` Module
=========================================================================

.. image:: ../imgs/unet.png
   :width: 600

:py:class:`~.UnetTrainer` class uses U-Net model, which is originally proposed in this `arXiv`_. 
Implemented trainer module uses this `Git`_ code as reference work.

************
References
************

.. target-notes::

.. _`arXiv`: https://arxiv.org/abs/1505.04597
.. _`Git`: https://github.com/milesial/Pytorch-UNet

:py:class:`~.UnetTrainer` class
-----------------------------------------

.. autoclass:: farabi.models.segmentation.unet.unet_trainer.UnetTrainer
   :members:
